name: Gladiator Beats
description:
Perform actions to the beat of the music in the gladiator arena! 

Can you defeat the boss in style?

 Bounce to the rhythm,  performing sequences of actions in order to gain style points. 
As you take down the Gladiator-Bot, avoid his attacks to avoid losing points and wrack up as many combos as you can to get a high-score after he's defeated.

SCORES DON'T SAVE, so remember and write them down if you want to put your scores down below ;)

---------------------------------------------

SUBMITTED FOR ROUND 3 OF GDKO2023.

The task for this round was to create a Boss Fight!

---------------------------------------------

Buttons:

Move:  A, D, Left Arrow, Right Arrow / Left D-Pad, Right D-Pad
Attack: Z, X, C, H, J, K, Enter, Space, Up Arrow / Left Button on Controller

(yes there's a load of buttons for just hit, that's just to give you the option of whatever is most comfortable for you to press in this rhythm game)

Actions you can perform:

Hit in Mid-air:  Press Attack when NOT next to an enemy

 
Hit Enemy: Press Attack when next to an enemy


Move: Press Move into an empty space


Swerve: Press Move INTO  an enemy to move past them

(You don't have to complete combos and get points to win the game. You don't lose lives when hit, only points. You can defeat the boss with minus 1000 points if you want, but the point of the game is to try to beat your previous score, not defeat the boss without dying ( to reiterate; you can't die, your goal is to get loads of style points by the time you finish beating the boss))  :)
